meanings.definition: The practice or profession of assisting women in childbirth.
meanings.sent1: Midwifery is crucial in helping women during childbirth.
meanings.sent2: She decided to pursue a career in midwifery to support expecting mothers.
meanings.sent3: The midwifery class had a surprise guest speaker - a stork!
meanings.sent4: Her gentle touch in midwifery was like a soothing balm to the laboring mother.
meanings.sent5: The art of midwifery requires patience, skill, and compassion.

meanings.sent1: Her dedication to midwifery is truly admirable.
meanings.sent2: The midwifery at the hospital is known for its exceptional care.
meanings.sent3: The midwifery team celebrated a successful delivery with a cake.
meanings.sent4: In the world of midwifery, every birth is a unique journey.
meanings.sent5: She found fulfillment in the meaningful work of midwifery.

meanings.definition: The techniques and skills of a midwife.
meanings.sent1: Learning the art of midwifery requires dedication and practice.
meanings.sent2: Her expertise in midwifery made her a trusted figure in the community.
meanings.sent3: The midwifery tools were neatly organized on the table.
meanings.sent4: She honed her midwifery skills through years of experience.
meanings.sent5: The precision of her midwifery techniques ensured safe deliveries.
